content:
Hello folks,

since a few weeks the autocomplete popup shows empty function signatures. From my memory this was not the case before, and maybe I messed something up, but I can not revert to the old behavior.

dots_in_function_signatures.png

Does anyone know what to do to get the signature back?
It might have changed recently (I vaguely remember hiding the return types), but there's no option to be more verbose
